ygData.subject: Re: Binding or not...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I agree. ... We were testing the waters for a future Vox raid.  Killed a lot of giants and spiders, didnt pull any bears or the Magi. However, I found a
ygData.messageBody:
>In a way I think it's a lot more valid bitch than some.
>That side of Norrath is very poorly service by gate points,
>so an expedition and evac return is definately more painful
>than anywhere else.

I agree.

>Were you doing a Vox run? Did you succeed?

We were testing the waters for a future Vox raid. Killed
a lot of giants and spiders, didnt pull any bears or the Magi.

However, I found a little secret entrance I had never seen before
which leads from the throne room straight to Vox's lair. Only
a bard with levitate can make it up there. (since our levitate
continues to make you rise up) - then I proceeded to die as
several ice giants agro'd on me out of my visual range. (pretty
far radius, maybe too far)

Good learning experience. Had about 25 level 40+ people.

Harmonic Distortion, 37th unchained melody.
League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
